comments.content:
Different typeface than the other “China Wok” image posted.

This one appears to be Malabar Heavy Italic (with a stroke and gradient fill effect added):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/malabar/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415045459/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/malabar/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/malabar/")
Thank you, I greatly appreciate all your help!
